title: 1,000 Blind People See For The First Time

comments.comment: Subscribe!! I’d hate for you to miss the next one of these we upload :D
I think its safe to say that MrBeast is probably the best content creator on the platform right now. Good on him for doing all that he does.
one of the best videos ive seen in a long time, good work mr beast:)
Absolute legend. Incredibly inspiring stuff Mr Beast
These are such beautiful emotional videos
Appreciate all you do to help others. You are setting a great example for the community Jimmy.
What a man you are, you deserve all the support
I can’t believe how kind and caring you are to all of the disabled and the poor
Hands down heartwarming to watch, well done Jimmy & team
Keep doing what you're doing man, you're an inspiration!
Respect to Mr Beast! Thank you for all the good you are doing
I pray for you that you become much bigger and help people in this way
I almost cried, you're doing so much for the world in general, you're such an awesome person Jimmy.
It is very rare that I cry for any reason, but I teared up watching this. Absolutely insane
I usually don't comment, but this man is literally the definition of kindness. I admire you soo much. I'm crying.
Jesteś takim dobrym człowiekiem ️
I actually had Cataract surgery a few years ago. It was a real life changer! Mr Beast you are changing lives!
You’re a real gem Jimmy, the world needs more of you.

I am in tears. Watching these people’s smiles as their lives are changed. Jimmy and the whole Mr. Beast team are legitimately changing the world with their work. They deserve ever bit of praise they receive.
Vc é um anjo,Parabens

This is probably the best thing I’ve seen on this platform. Heartwarming and tear-jerking. I had my laser eye surgery last October and my life was immediately 1000x better, can’t even imagine how these people must feel. This is amazing.
I am speechless... One of the best work️️ Mr Beast ️ Salute️ Respect ️

I absolutely never get emotional watching movies/tv/anything else but this genuinely almost made me cry from happiness. Just seeing these people go through life altering changes is amazing. As someone who suffers from a chronic physical illness myself this really is incredible to watch.
Sensacional o que você faz .. parabéns
The only youtuber to make me cry and smile at the same time, incredible to see many people's lives changed by this.
This man and all his friends and crew have done so much for others, he deserves all the fame he has and more at this point.
Ok, Jimmy. I am a mom so I am fairly new to you, but I can't even say how many times you already made me smile.. This one made me cry. How unbelievably awesome to help others see.
Wow man. The episode was speechless and extremely tear Filling. What Jimmy does for the people of this world is insane. He needs to be honoured. Recognised. Just everything. Well done Mr Beas

When I was a kid I didnt realize how bad my eyes were.  Only needed glasses, but the first thing that blew my mind and I remember to this day decades later, was seeing nature in high definition for the first time.  I bet these people were blown away.  Such an amazing channel, what a kind soul.
I fully started crying watching this, this is so unbelievably amazing. I can't believe how much goodness we all get to witness through Jimmy
Incredible! you helped them without paying a single dollar. wow!

I’ve been blind since birth, my disability comes with an incredible amount of pain and fatigue 24/7, there is nothing that can be done for me in terms of recovery, I would give a ton to see normally for even a day, so I understand how truly miraculous this would be for those people he helped. He has given them an eternal gift. Thanks Mr Beast
I really appreciate his kindness and how he uses his money for so good things
He really stepped his game up for this one... I think I had to wipe tears from my eyes at least 5 times
Jimmy and the team are probably some of the only genuine creators on the platform right now and its amazing seeing what they've done
Incredible Jimmy.
You are literally changing the world. You are such an amazing human being.

one of the only creators who can make me cry and feel inspired at the same time.

we NEED more Jimmy's in this world!
This one made me tear up a bit… Jimmy thanks for helping so many people around the world. You and your crew are a bunch of amazing people and never fail to amaze your audience.
Gotta say, this brought me to tears. Jimmy, you are without a doubt one of the most humble people I have ever seen
Wow I actually cried watching this...seeing someone using their massive platform to change so many lives is so inspiring...thank you Jimmy <3
Watching this made me cry, thank you for making the world a better place, Jimmy

Man this brings a tear in my eye.
This is so wholesome it’s unreal.

As someone currently losing their eyesight, this was incredible to watch. I know exactly how most of them felt/ lived before the surgery. What he's done for all these people is nothing short of giving them their lives back
this guy genuinely deserves our respect and support

This is the best most pure thing I’ve ever seen. You’re an incredible human being, I hope you are deeply and heavily supported forever, I can’t imagine how fulfilling it must be to help so many people so dramatically. I hope you never stop.
Back when the haters were getting dissed…
I’m actually crying from how amazing you are to do this to so many people that truly are in need, this is incredible.
I cried watching this. It's amazing what people can do with kindness in their heart.
The fact that Jimmy went from doing challenges to saving lives around the world is admirable. Mad respect for Jimmy !
this makes me cry
Best influencer ever. Actually making a huge impact in the world. Always giving back. Don’t ever feel too pressured you’re doing amazing and we love you jimmy

As a person who didn't realize just how bad my eyes actually were, now that both have been done and my vision is actually better than before the cataracts, I SO appreciate you doing this for so many! It does make such a HUGE difference in giving people back their freedom!

You know I’ve never cried from one of y’all’s videos before? That definitely changed today. Radical philanthropy is one of the most beautiful things on the planet especially when you can share the experience with so many others
"Oh... we are surprised to hear you haven't received any money! ... What ... what can we do now?"
The amount of kindness this dude is doing amaze me out of this world and that's amazing
I'm literally sobbing, this is such an amazing thing to do. Thank you for helping so many people.

hes gonna be guy who's donated the most, changed the most lives and helped the world be a better place when he's done.  I won't be surprised to see him win some type of lifetime achievement award.  great content and doing great things for people.  you gotta love it.
This made me cryyyyyyy
This could have been an hour and i would have watched the whole thing in tears. You're incredible man.
This is hands down THE most heart warming thing I have EVER seen. Jimmy you are one amazing human being.
Well done man
I love the part where you actually paid for the surgeries...
This legit made me cry. Thank you for blessing our world, jimmy. Please never change.
This made my day seeing their reactions. Protect Jimmy at all costs!
Thank you for having a channel that promotes helping people and giving back.  Your whole team is truly legendary and deserve all the goodness in the world.
Thank you for helping people to see
This man is on a whole new level of kindness
From doing challenges to saving lives? Hats off to you Jimmy! Your the best!
As someone who works in eye care and sees how cataract surgery impacts people, thank you. You’re amazing, Jimmy.
1:50 Ur THe Bestt!
This is what life is about. What an example he is setting for us humans. If we all helped each other and treated each other right the world would be much happier.
I can't believe people anyone could accuse you of making anyone perform for us. This was beautiful

The difference you make in people's lives is so inspiring.  When other YouTubers are living it up in their mansions, you've stayed grounded and humble and use your wealth to help others. The leadership in this country could learn alot from you. As a 20 year disabled Veteran that's hard for me to say but it's true. Actually that reminds me, maybe someday look into doing something for Vets, there are a ton of homeless veterans, down and out vets that the VA either can't help or won't help. Just an idea, but no matter who it is, you always inspire others to do more for humanity and that's the real treasure!
This person helps others, which in turn helps his channel, which in turn enables him to help more people. It's the gift that keeps on giving
The respect for this man just rises up and up.

I don't usually cry, but there's something special about his videos. Seeing people tear up from both excitement and emotion by simply achieving something as simple to us, such as normal vision, is just something else. Let's hope people learn from him and show what it is to be a human. Remember, we're all the same species.
Only 62/1000 cured and it took more than a year to pay the surgery money
Man you just don't realize how much this made me tear up. You're a good man Jimmy. Thank you for this.

The fact that you can do anything with your money, and you choose to help people is admirable. Hopefully it will help to push people to want to help this world more, it’s needed. Especially in a time of darkness. You are one of a kind!
I love how they just can’t stop smiling unless they’re crying for joy.
I cant believe it , his videos get each time better and more meaningful, while helping others. This is on another level
I legitimately teared up watching this. Mr. Beast does so much for so many people. We are so fortunate to have him in our lifetimes.

I don't know how anyone could watch this and feel negatively about it... I'm so grateful you give back to this broken world.. I'm so grateful you are as successful as you are, and you still chose to help people.. and literally change people's lives.. you are an incredible person. Thank you for documenting this and sharing it with us all. It made my day.
How about you pay the clinic you took advantage of in Mexico?
damn,crying while watching this makes me think there still are good people on this earth.
This is absolutely heart warming. Jimmy is such a goddamn wonderful person and the world wouldn't be the same without him.
This man's just casually changing people's lives and I'm here for it
Это очень здорово , что ты помогаешь
This is the kind of content I'm excited to see. Thank you Jimmy for making a difference in so many lives!
The fact the Jimmy was facing adventures to help the people was so kind. Mad respect to you Jimmy ️.
I’ve never seen such an amazing act of kindness in my life before. This is truly a miracle for those people, and Jimmy is truly the most influential creator on this platforms.
Pay them.
